# AI Attribution

This project was developed with assistance from AI tools. In the spirit of transparency, this document describes how AI was used in its creation.

## AI Tools Used

- **GitHub Copilot (Claude Opus 4.5)** - Used for planning architecture, generating code, and writing documentation.

## What Was AI-Assisted

### Planning & Architecture
- Initial two-way sync architecture design
- Conflict resolution strategy options
- State management approach

### Code Generation
- Core sync logic and client extensions
- Pydantic models for API requests/responses  
- CLI implementation with Click
- Systemd service configuration

### Documentation
- README structure and content
- Code comments and docstrings
- This attribution file

## Human Contributions

- Original [trakt-to-serializd](https://github.com/VanillaChief/trakt-to-serializd) migration tool
- Original [serializd-py](https://github.com/VanillaChief/serializd-py) client library
- Requirements definition and feature decisions
- Code review and testing
- API credentials and authentication

## Verification

All AI-generated code has been reviewed and tested by the maintainer before being committed.

*Last updated: January 2026*
